title: Anyone selling t206 Drum or Uzit HOFer
author: David R

posts.post_title: Anyone selling t206 Drum or Uzit HOFer
posts.post_content:
Looking for a Drum or Uzit backed HOFer. Please let me know if you have one for sale or trade. 

Thanks,
David R
Still looking.  I am also looking for a Cycle 460 Hall of Famer if anyone has one to sell.

pretty tough to come by but they are out there and usually have a very heavy tag
